citations.desc: ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 10am on
23-Nov-16.
Knock on door, tried to leave message, phone would not take a message. Waited 30 minutes.
